title.narrative: Support to management of SEA aid program 2017-2018

description.narrative: Funding under this investment provides support to the ASEAN and Regional Programs Section (ARS) for costs associated with the implementation and evaluation of the ASEAN and Mekong program including regional economic growth and human security programs. Activities will support: effective aid planning, implementation of aid investments, monitoring of aid investments, development of investment concepts and designs, peer reviews of investments, undertake quality processes, development of Aid Investment Plans and Aid Program Performance Reports. The estimated total value of this investment is $0.25 million to be expensed in the 2017-18 financial year.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
